name: r3v3rs1
body:
# r3v3rs1
The name r3v3rs1 comes from the word 'reverse'. It is our goal to 'reverse' the timeline of technology development through artificial intelligence or AI. We believe that if we can achieve the traditional goal of AI, we will be able to accelerate the development of technology and create a better world for humanity. The traditional of AI was to realize human like intelligence in machines. This github account will host/link opensource projects which we think are relevant to that goal.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
